# DateTimeExtensions.ToTimeSpanUiAsString method

Converts time of the DateTime object with format HH:mm:ss.

```csharp
public static string ToTimeSpanUiAsString(this DateTime target)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| target | Target datetime. |

## Return Value

A String that contains time of target datetime.
